item.description:
Let's go down to the Grog and dance the night away to the great sound of Don't Call Me Shirley.

We will meet downstairs by the entrance to the dance floor. There is usually a cover charge so be prepared to pay (the last time Shirley was at the Grog, the Cover was $5.00)

 

Please make sure you bring the Meetup Cell phone with you (978-304-2811) in case you are running late, have to cancel at the last minute or can't find us.

 

Also, please remember if you haven't paid your dues for the year yet, please consider paying at this event. See one of the organizers if you can't locate when you have paid last.

 

Hope to see you all at the Grog

Donna & janet
item.name: Don't Call Me Shirley @ The Grog
